title: The Key to Organizational and construction Excellence: A Study of Total Quality Management. (arXiv:2305.13104v1 [econ.GN])
abstract: This study examines the impact of Total Quality Management (TQM) practices on organizational outcomes. Results show a significant relationship between TQM practices such as top executive commitment, education and teaching, process control, and continuous progress, and how they can be leveraged to enhance performance outcomes.
context:
Title: The Key to Organizational and construction Excellence: A Study of Total Quality Management. (arXiv:2305.13104v1 [econ.GN])
Abstract: This study examines the impact of Total Quality Management (TQM) practices on organizational outcomes. Results show a significant relationship between TQM practices such as top executive commitment, education and teaching, process control, and continuous progress, and how they can be leveraged to enhance performance outcomes.
translated_title: 组织和建设卓越的关键：全面质量管理研究
translated_abstract: 本研究探讨全面质量管理（TQM）实践对组织绩效的影响。研究结果表明，TQM实践如高管承诺、教育和培训、过程控制以及持续改进等与如何利用这些实践来提高绩效结果之间存在显著的关系。
tldr: 本研究发现，通过实施全面质量管理的实践，如高管承诺、教育和培训、过程控制以及持续改进，可以提高组织的绩效结果。
